SourceString: Something seems to be happening in the village of Tsuskul.\nLet's go to her elf boys, Shishinota and Konota, in the dining room of the Garden of Learning.

Sage's elixir for Himea's servant Yonja! Apparently, the material is the fossilized worm that

Once he has it, he will give it to his girlfriend Akashi in the boarding house in Tskuru Village.

In the village of Tsuskuru, please make the sage's elixir for Himea's servant Yonja!\nwas asked. He obtained a fossil of a worm as a material and asked Akashi to mix the hermit's elixir.\nLet's take it to Youngja.
At Yonja's request in the village of Tsuskuru, I prepared the\nSage's Elixir with Akashi.\nAt that time, he found a mysterious book at the Shrine of Wisdom and decided to read it in Akashi's room.

In the village of Tsuskuru, Yonja asked me to prepare the immortal's elixir with\nAkashi.\nAt that time, I found a mysterious book at the Shrine of Wisdom that described the existence of an unknown room during the Age of the Gods.
Shishinota seems to be waiting for you at the dining room in the learning garden of Tsuskuru Village.

Let's look for Shishinota in the learning garden of Tsuskuru Village\nMysterious Room, Age of Gods Room! I was invited.\nAt Akashi's suggestion, she decided to visit the Dong family, a family of architects living in the Dolworm Kingdom.

Let's go look for Shishinota in the mysterious room of the Age of Gods in Tsuskuru Village!\ninvited me. A visit to the architect of Dolworm reveals that the Sakura Room in the staff quarters is the entrance to an underground labyrinth that leads to the Age of Gods Room. Let's return to the Garden of Learning and report to her, Shishinota.

Let's look for the mysterious room
Age of the Gods in Shishinota in the village of Tsuskuru! I was invited.

The Age of Gods Room.
Shishinota seems to be waiting for you at the dining room in the learning garden of Tsukuru Village.

In the learning garden of Tsuskuru village, ask Shishinota, the leader of Wakaba's expedition,\nLet's go underground exploring the mysterious room, the Age of Gods! I was invited.\nFirst of all, it seems like we're heading for the Sakura Room, which is the entrance to the underground labyrinth.

In the learning garden of Tsuskuru village, ask Shishinota, the leader of Wakaba's expedition team, to\nLet's go underground exploring the Age of Gods! I was invited.\nLet's head to the Sakura Room in the staff dormitory.

A ladder leading to the\nunderground labyrinth was found in the Cherry Blossom Room, a room in the staff quarters in the Garden of Learning.\nMy girlfriend, Hajika-sensei, will also join us in the underground exploration as a guide for everyone.

When we finally arrived at the Age of Gods room in the village of Tsuskuru, it became clear that\nMr. Hajika was aiming for the forbidden technique of eternal youth.\nThe shrine maiden Himea chased the beast that had escaped from the Age of Gods.
It seems that Akashi is waiting for you at the dormitory in the learning garden of Tsukuru Village.

Let's ask Akashi to find

she seemed to have headed to the Windy City of Azuran.

Let's find Akashi
Shrine Maiden Himea in the learning garden of Tsuskuru Village! I was told.

Himea did not answer her Akashi's questions and she returned to the village of Tsuskuru.

I want the shrine maiden Himea from the village of Tsuskuru to go to the\nWorld Tree Hill with me!\nwas asked. It seems that the hill of the World Tree is the place where Kohaku, his girlfriend, promised Himea to exchange the cup of oath.

Let's go to her mansion in Himea in the village of Tskul.

In the village of Tsuskuru, I was asked by the shrine maiden Himea to go to\nWorld Tree Hill and have a battle with Kohaku.\nThe shrine maiden Himea performed the wedding ceremony with Kohaku, who passed away on the hill of the World Tree.
Nebel, an elf girl in the Windy City of Azlan, seems to be in trouble.
To Nibel, a girl in the windy city of Azlan,\nGet back the ring that was stolen by the big bird!\nIt seems that she flew to the monster bird forest in Kirika Grassland.

To Nibel, a girl in the windy town of Azlan,
Get back the ring that was stolen by the big bird!

Kirika Grassland, which is located northeast of the Azran region.

It seems that Sigurd, a Valhalla warrior who met her there, needs advice from
<pc>.
First, let's go deliver her ring to my girlfriend, Nibel.

At the request of Nibel, a girl from the windy town of Azlan,
delivered the ring she had retrieved at the monster bird's nest. She met Sigurd, a Valhalla warrior, in the forest.
Enter the special big house in Azran and head for the room with the
pink door to her right!

I went to retrieve the ring of the girl Nibel, and at the monster bird's nest, I met Sigurd, a warrior of Valhalla.\nThen, she was welcomed into the mansion of the lord of Azlan and into the hall of Valhalla.\n<pc> became a warrior of the giants.
It seems that the warrior Sigurd is waiting for you at the Hall of Valhalla in Azlan, the Windy City.
In the hall of Valhalla in the Windy City of Azran, I asked the warrior Sigurd to\ngo with me to the entertainment island of the giants in order to search for Thor, the sage of power!

In the Windy City of Azran, I asked the warrior Sigurd to go with me to the entertainment island of the giants to find Thor, the sage of power!\nWhen he arrived on Luckland Island, Sigurd told him that he had immediately found\nthe sage Thor. Let's find the human lady who had the doll.

I received a request from the warrior Sigurd in the Windy City of Azlan and came to Luckland Island to search for Thor, the sage of power.\nAda, the owner of Sage Thor, whom I met in front of the Colosseum, seems to be willing to trade Sage Thor for\nthe steel sword.

I went to Luckland Island with the warrior Sigurd in search of Thor, the sage of power.\nI gave the steel sword to Ada, the owner of Thor the Wise, whom I met in front of the Colosseum, and asked her to give Thor the Sage to her.\nLet's return to her Valhalla mansion in Azlan, the Windy City.

Ada.
In the halls of Valhalla, the sage Thor woke up.
He offered to find the whereabouts of the remaining three wise men.
It seems that the warrior Sigurd is waiting for you at the Hall of Valhalla in Azran, the Windy City.

Let's go find the two wise men with the warrior Sigurd in the Windy City of Azlan! I was told.\nAccording to the divination of the sage Thor, the two wise men are somewhere in the world.\nIt seems that he is asleep in a house where orphaned children gather in the castle town of the pink castle.

, but the true identity of the demon dragon was the monster Pusugon.

the situation calms down and she returns to the Hall of Valhalla.

The balance of the world that the warriors of the Hall of Valhalla in Azran, the Windy City, desired was the composition of the dolls.\nHowever, his efforts did not reach the heart of\nFura, the mediator Odin, and the world of dolls was shrouded in darkness.

At Kamiharmy Castle, Dr. Hanetsuki will ask you to protect me as I find out where\nthe demonic miasma is coming from!\nIt seems like you should go to the cave in the northern part of Kamiharumui territory.

At Kamiharmui Castle, I received a request from Happa and went to the Dark Tree and defeated the Mashouu-o-tachi that appeared from the demon miasma.\nThe true identity of the Great Dark Tree is revealed to be the World Tree, and Dr. Hanetsuki is trying to find a way to eliminate the\nmagic miasma that covers its core.

Happa successfully destroyed the dark demonic miasma that covered the core and protected the Great Dark Tree.
It seems that he will continue to protect the Great Dark Tree from now on.
In the village of Lane, Rebekah, the daughter of the village chief Setley, seems to be worried about something.

I would like to ask Lubeka of Lane Village
I want to investigate the cause of Dahlia drowning in the sea, so
I would like you to ask Mayor Setori if there are any documents from that time!
was asked.

I obtained the old villager list, which is a clue to the Dahlia incident that Rubeka is pursuing, by defeating the ancient Tsuchiwarashi in\nThe Oblivion Cave in Raynham Midorino.\nLet's go deliver it to Rubekah.
The old villager list obtained in the cave gave a clue that\nthe name of a 10-year-old girl had been erased.\nRubekah told her that she would do the next part again and received a reward.
It seems that the girl detective Rubeka is waiting for her\nassistant to arrive in Lane Village.
I want Rebekah, the girl detective from Lane Village, to be my assistant as I start investigating again!\nwas asked.

I became assistant to the girl detective Rubeka who is pursuing the truth of the Dahlia incident.\nI would like to ask mainly the elderly about her unpleasant lullaby that has been passed down in the village!
The poet who wrote Barbasa's lullaby seems to have headed to the town of Julet in search of a new song.\nI want Rebekah to ask the elderly people in her Julet about the poet\n! she was asked.

It seems that the poet who wrote the lullaby that Barbasa sang forgot the notebook in which he wrote the story in\nJulet town.\nSince then, the notebook has been kept in a chest of drawers at the church.

The poet's notebook that you obtained in the town of Julet recorded an incident in which a villager died because of the words of\nthe girl's death.\nRubekah ends her investigation by confessing that she heard the same voice inside her head.
It seems that Detective Girl Rubeka is waiting for her\nassistant to arrive in Lane Village.
The girl detective Rubeka from Lane Village\nwants to know about a girl who used the language of death and used the language of death, so\nI want you to be my assistant! she was asked.

The girl who uses the word of death and the girl whose name was erased from the village list are
the same person.Rubeka wants you to interview
 the situation at Dahlia's wedding at the church!
was asked.

Father Raja of the church told me that the girl who spoke death words to Dahlia was locked in a cave by\nangry villagers.\nShe wants Rubekah to go with her to the cave on the beach in the Korut region! she was asked.

I defeated the
Bone Prisoner that lived in a cave on the beach in the Korut region, and investigated the room where the girl was trapped.
Rubekah heard a girl's voice in the room, and
she told her that she wanted to continue until she was tired.
It seems that Detective Girl Rubeka is waiting for her\nassistant to arrive in Lane Village.

.

By interviewing Priest Lillie at the Prayer Inn, I obtained
's locked diary.
Get back the
priest's keys from <%sEV_QUE_NAME0> in Rubeka's Jurelia underground mine!
To get back the key to the priest's diary, I headed to the Jurelia underground mine and defeated\n<%sEV_QUE_NAME0> and got the priest's key set.\nLet's go show it to Rebekah.

Fiya while she was still alive.
When Fiya called her name, Rubeka was frightened by
the fear of death and the investigation was halted.
It seems Rubekah is waiting for help in Lane Village.

I want Lubeka from Lane Village to go with me to Dorroy Falls, where
Fiya met her end!
was asked.
Dolroy Falls appears to be in the Herbunar Rainforest.

I want Lubeka from Lane Village to go with me to Dorroy Falls, where
Fiya met her end!
was asked. Dorroy Falls appears to be located in her Bunner rainforest.
Rubeka seems to want to go upstream of the waterfall.

Fiya's ghost appeared at Dorroy Falls.
It turns out that Fiya didn't have the power of the words of death, and they were words of warning.
I want Rubekah to take her to a hole in the north of the Bunar Rainforest!
was asked.

At the Bunar Stone Cave that Fiya showed me, I defeated Hadonryu, the real culprit who sank Dahlia into the sea.\nI want Rubekah to hear her Fiya's wish to meet Reg and Dahlia.\nI want her to deduce the location and head there!

When I heard Fiya's wish and went to the cenotaph on Memorial Beach,\nFiya ascended to heaven where Reg and Dahlia were waiting.\nRubekah declares that her Dahlia case has been solved and takes down the girl detective sign.
Wedi's female petri who lives in a private house on the north side of Julet town seems to be in trouble.
I want Petri, who lives in the town of Julet, to help me find and punish\nthe culprit who steals food!\nwas asked.
I helped out with a petri dish in the town of Julet.\nI found and caught the culprit who was stealing food.\nI want Petri to keep an eye on her as she is purposely away from her house!

I watched the house to catch the culprit who was stealing food, and
found out that the culprit was a cat monster. In Petri dish, he went to the hut on Ladis King Island and
punished me for me! He seems fine if you take a
canoe from the Meuse coast south of town or a merchant's carriage outside town.

fisher of level 36 or higher! I was told.

I took the test to become a\nlevel 36 or higher angler from Harmos, the fishing master south of the port town of Rendoa, and successfully completed it.\nHe was told by Halmos that fishing will reach its limit at level 40 next time.

SourceString:
Congratulations
You, who are active as a first-class adventurer, have been selected to participate in the
Big Thank You Campaign sponsored by the World Inn Association!
The person in charge, Lynx, will be waiting for her at the inn in the Kingdom of Gran Zedora!

Links said that he is General Manager of the Grand Zedora of the World Inn Association.\nTo give you the gift that you won in the campaign sponsored by the World Inn Association, let's move to\nLynx's office and discuss the details! I was told.

A message from Lynx says he is General Manager of the World Inn Association Gran Zedora\nI would like you to come with me to the Lynx office to give me the gift that I won in the campaign sponsored by the World Inn Association!\nLet's talk to Lynx.

Links said that he is the general manager of the World Inn Association Gran Zedora.
In order to make the Lula Booster effective.
In the cave on the north side of the Ceredot mountain path, the stones are glowing at night.
Investigate the waterside. Lula Moon. I want you to pick some grass!

Linx, who is the General Manager of the World Inn Association Gran Zedora, wants you to collect Lulamoon Grass from the cave on the north side of
Ceredot Mountain Pass in order to make use of
Lula Booster's effects!
I got Lulamoon Grass, so let's take it.

From Lynx, who is the General Manager of the World Inn Association Gran Zedora
I want you to collect the Lulamoon Grass from the Ceredot Mountain Pass!
He successfully obtained the Lula Moon Grass and the true Lula Booster was completed
, so he talked to Lynx and tried using it.

From Lynx, who is the General Manager of the World Inn Association Gran Zedora\nI want you to try using the true Megalula Stone!\nwas asked. I tried using the True Ruler Booster, but I was sent to a mysterious place and attacked by monsters. Let's talk to Lynx.

From Lynx, who is the General Manager of the World Inn Association Gran Zedora\nI want you to try using the true Megalula Stone!\nwas asked. I tried using the True Ruler Booster, but I was sent to a mysterious place and attacked by monsters. Let's talk to Lynx.

From Lynx at the inn in the Kingdom of Gran Zedora\nI won a campaign sponsored by the World Inn Association, so I want you to use the Lula Booster once! I was told.\nIt looks like Rula was able to do it safely, so he goes to report to Lynx.

I received a
Lula Booster from Lynx at the inn in the Kingdom of Gran Zedora because I won a campaign sponsored by the
World Inn Association.
Use it for your future adventures.
In True Gran Zedora Kingdom a merchant, Reybassa, seems to be looking\nfor a top-notch locksmith skilled enough to make the Great Thief's Key.
In True Gran Zedora Kingdom a merchant, Reybassa, would like us to help\nin obtaining the legendary armor!

In True Gran Zedora Kingdom a merchant, Reybassa, asks us to help in
obtaining the legendary armor by having a top-notch locksmith make a
key to open the Iron Safe! It seems that there's a top-notch locksmith
in True Arahagiro Kingdom.

In True Gran Zedora Kingdom a merchant, Reybassa, asks us to help have a top-notch locksmith make a
key to open the Iron Safe! The locksmith, Grane, told us to retrieve the
key-making material, Red Hot Fragment, from a <%sEV_QUE_NAME0> in True
Arahagiro Region.

In True Gran Zedora Kingdom a merchant, Reybassa, asks us to help have a top-notch locksmith make a
key to open the Iron Safe! Having retrieved the key-making material,
a Red Hot Fragment, let's get back to True Arahagiro Kingdom and have
Grane make the key.

In True Gran Zedora Kingdom a merchant, Reybassa, asks us to help have a top-notch locksmith make a\nkey to open the Iron Safe! The locksmith, Grane, made the Iron Safe Key,\nso let's give it to Reybassa.

In True Gran Zedora Kingdom, we gave a merchant, Reybassa, the key to
open his Iron Safe containing a legendary armor, the Long Johns, inside.
Reybassa, having obtained the legendary Long Johns, decided to open his
own shop and live there with his family.
As thanks, he gave us the Iron Safe.
Cosmin, a genius hairdresser in the city of Megistris, seems to be worried about something.
Will you help Cosmin, a genius hairdresser in the city of Megistris, to\ncreate special cosmetics that will attract the attention of your darling?

Will you help the genius hairdresser Cosmin in the city of Megistris to
create special cosmetics that will attract the attention of your darling?
It seems that she has a
material called Metamorph Honey in the Epistesa Hills, so I'll help her get it.

Will you help the genius hairdresser Cosmin in the city of Megistris to
create special cosmetics that will attract the attention of your darling?
At Epistesa Hills, she got Metamorph Honey
, so let's give it to her Cosmin.

I helped make cosmetics for adults at the request of Cosmin, a genius hairdresser in the city of Megistris.
I want you to take a picture of my girlfriend Cosmin to see her proportions
when she transforms into an adult!
It seems like the photos she took are important to her

I helped make cosmetics for adults at the request of Cosmin, a genius hairdresser in the city of Megistris.
I want you to take a picture of my girlfriend Cosmin to see her proportions
when she transforms into an adult! I was asked to take a
photo. I'll show the photo to my girlfriend Cosmin.

I helped make cosmetics for adults at the request of Cosmin, a genius hairdresser in the city of Megistris.\nThe girl who transformed into an adult was Cosmin, but she quickly changed back to a child, so I took a photo of her as Cosmin instead.\nShe is in the soldier training room in the basement of Gran Zedora Castle.<lf >I want you to give it to Lucien!

I decided to help Cosmin, a genius hairdresser in the city of Megistris,
achieve love. When she gave a photo of her as an adult to Lucien, a new
soldier at Gran Zedora Castle, she discovered that Lucien also liked
Cosmin. Let's tell Lucien's feelings to his girlfriend Cosmin.

I helped Cosmin, a genius hairdresser in the city of Megistris,
to achieve love, and was able to tell her
that she was in love with Lucien, a new soldier.
It seems that Cosmin has decided to
start a shop in the city of Megistris that can
change the size of the human body.
A girl named Airi seems to be in trouble at the fairy tale writer's\nhouse in Melsandy Village.
Could you please bring back the\nwheat that was stolen by\n<%sEV_QUE_NAME0> from Airi in Melsandy Village?

Recover <%nEV_QUE_T_NUM0> pieces of wheat that were stolen by\n<%sEV_QUE_NAME0> from Melsandy Granary from Airi in Melsandy Village. Could you please come?\nwas asked. She is currently collecting <%nEV_QUE_N_NUM0> Melsan Wheat.

Would you please bring back the wheat that was stolen by
<%sEV_QUE_NAME0> from Airi in Melsandy Village
and bring it back to Melan Watermill in the northwest of the village?
You retrieved wheat from <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>, so let's go to the watermill
and make flour.

Would you please bring back the wheat that was stolen by
<%sEV_QUE_NAME0> from Airi in Melsandy Village
and turn it into powder at Merun Watermill, northwest of the village?
You got Melsan Flour at the watermill, so let's go back to Airi.

At the request of Airi of Melsandy Village, I recovered the stolen wheat\nand made flour. Airi, the girlfriend who baked soft bread, entrusted me\nwith her basket of bread. Would you please give it to Grandpa Lapett?
At the request of Airi of Melsandy Village, I recovered the stolen wheat\nand made flour. Using flour, I safely delivered the bread Airi had baked\nto Lapett. Let's report to Airi.

At the request of Airi of Melsandy Village, I delivered the baked bread
she made using Melsan Flour to Lapett! As a matter of fact,
\The Story of the Little Hero Zankrone" apparently has an unreleased
fourth edition with a sad ending."
In the fairy tale writer's house in Melsandy Village, the\nhelper Rudy seems to be in trouble.
I want you to find Airi, who chased the\ngiant rabbit from Lude in Melsandy Village!
I want you to find Airi, who chased the\ngiant rabbit from Lude in Melsandy Village!\nLet's ask the villagers about Airi's whereabouts.
From Rudy in Melsandy Village\nI want you to find Airi who chased the giant rabbit!\nIt seems that Airi has gone to Sunbeam Square.

At the request of Rudy from Melsandy Village,\nI found Airi in the depths of Labani's Hole in Sunbeam Square.\nLet's chase after her girlfriend Airi who chased her mischievous rabbits that appear in fairy tales!

I found Airi in Rabbani's Hole at the request of Rudy from Melsandy Village.
He saw Zankrone, a hero from a fairy tale, appear in this world.He
witnessed Airi, who had collapsed, and Zankrone carried her
home. Let's go back to Airi's house.
I found Airi in Rabbani's Hole at the request of Rudy from Melsandy Village.\nThe fairy tale hero Zankrone witnessed him appear in this world, and\nAiri said that he was deeply shocked by her.
Airi seems to be in trouble at the fairy tale writer's house in Melsandy Village.

I want Airi from Melsandy Village to become
Zankrone's power!
In order to lure the naughty rabbit to her, she first
looks for her jam and butter to use as a trap.

From Airi of Melsandy Village, I want you to become Zankrone's\npower! To lure out the naughty rabbit, she first searches for her jam and butter to use as a trap.\nIt seems that Hanne in the field has jam, and Lyon in the tavern has her butter.

From Airi of Melsandy Village, I want you to become Zankrone's\npower! She is the naughty rabbit's\nfavorite food. She got jam and butter, so she takes them to the depths of Rabbani's hole in the Sunbeam Square and lures out her rabbits.

At the request of Airi of Melsandy Village, I cooperated with Zankrone and lured out the\nrabbit. The rabbits were defeated, leaving behind a prophecy that a witch would appear. In fact, it seems that her real body, Zankrone, has been torn apart by a witch's curse. He will return to Melsandy Village and report to Airi.

At the request of Airi of Melsandy Village, I cooperated with Zankrone and lured out the\nrabbit. The rabbits were about to be defeated when they left behind a prophecy that a witch would appear. Airi seems to be worried that the\ntragic ending depicted in story 4 will come true.
Airi seems to be in trouble at the fairy tale writer's house in Melsandy Village.
I was asked by Airi in Melsandy Village to take the chicken, which is\nthe witch's weak point, to the well in Sunbeam Square in order to prevent\nthe witch from appearing!

I was asked by Airi in Melsandy Village to take the chicken, which is
the witch's weak point, to the well in Sunbeam Square in order to prevent
the witch from appearing! Rasha, Airi's friend, looks like she will be
able to lend me her chicken.

I was asked by Airi in Melsandy Village to take the chicken, which is
the witch's weak point, to the well in Sunbeam Square in order to prevent
the witch from appearing! Rasha, Airi's friend, asked that if I would
go to the Yellow Leaf Shop in Rhone Forest and buy chickpeas, she would
lend her chicken.

I was asked by Airi in Melsandy Village to take the chicken, which is

the witch from appearing! Rasha, Airi's friend, asked that if I would

lend her chicken.

I was asked by Airi of Melsandy Village to take the chicken, which is
the witch's weak point, to the well in Sunbeam Square in order to prevent
the witch from appearing! You borrowed the chicken from Rasha, so let's
head to the well in Sunbeam Square.

At the request of Airi of Melsandy Village, I borrowed a chicken to
prevent the witch from appearing, but it had no effect when the Witch
Gretzel appeared. Zankrone rushed in and was defeated by the witch, and
the witch declared that Melsandy Village will be destroyed.
Let's report to Airi.

At the request of Airi of Melsandy Village, I borrowed a chicken to
prevent the witch from appearing, but it had no effect when the Witch
Gretzel appeared. Zankrone rushed in and was defeated by the witch, and
the witch declared that Melsandy Village will be destroyed.
Airi felt depressed that she couldn't do anything.
Lapett, who is doing a picture-story show in Melsandy Village, seems to\nbe in trouble.
Give Airi the Great Crimson Jewel from Lapett in Melsandy Village.\nTell her not to give up hope and cheer her up!
Give Airi the Great Crimson Jewel from Lapett in Melsandy Village.\nTell her not to give up hope and cheer her up!

Give Airi the Great Crimson Jewel from Lapett in Melsandy Village.
Tell her not to give up hope and cheer her up! However, Airi was taken
away by the Witch Gretzel. Let's hurry to the banquet hall in the Witch's
Forest, which extends from Rhone Forest.

I was asked by Lapett in Melsandy Village, to cheer up Airi!
I rescued her, when she was taken away by the witch.
Zankrone returned to the world of fairy tales. Airi declared that she
would write a continuation of her fairy tale.
Let's go back to Melsandy Village.

I was asked by Lapett in Melsandy Village, to cheer up Airi!
I rescued her, when she was taken away by the witch.
Zankrone returned to the world of fairy tales. Airi declared that she
would write a continuation of her fairy tale.
Therogue drow on the high ground east of Seredo town seems to be in\ntrouble.

Recover the glittering book that
was stolen from
by <%sEV_QUE_NAME0> while cleaning up a pile of rubble from an old church
from a drow on a hill east of the town of Seredo!

Recover the Glittering Book that was stolen by
<%sEV_QUE_NAME0> from the drow on the hill east of the town of Seredo while
cleaning up the pile of rubble from the old collapsed church!
It seems that <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>, who stole the book, appears on the Ceredot mountain path.
Recover the Glittering Book from the drow on the hill east of Seredo Town!\nAfter defeating <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>, he retrieved his Glittering Book.\nGo back to town and report to the drow.

I retrieved a
Glittering Book at the request of a drow on a hill east of Seredo town.
The drow will check the contents of the book and deliver it to the
mayor's house on the west side of town! he asked.

At the request of the drow on the hill east of the town of Seredo, I
recovered the glittering book and delivered it to a girl named Lucoria at the mayor's house. Lucoria, who claims to be Lieselotte's
her twin sister, tells her that this book is Lieselotte's belongings.
Let's return to the drow and report.

At the request of the drow on the hill east of the town of Seredo, I
recovered the glittering book and delivered it to Lieselotte's sister, Lucoria.
After reporting to the drow, it was discovered that most of the children in the town had been caught in her rubble and
had died. Lucoria seems to be her only surviving child.
It seems that\nLucoria at the mayor's house in Seredo town is asking for help.
Lucoria, who is at the mayor's house in the town of Ceredo, would like\nto deliver the letter she wrote to her sister Lieselotte! she was asked.
Lucoria, who is at the mayor's house in Seredo town, would like\nto deliver the letter she wrote to her sister Lieselotte! she was asked.
Lucoria, who is at the mayor's house in Seredo Town, would like\nto deliver the letter she wrote to her sister Lieselotte! she was asked.

At the request of Lucoria at the mayor's house in Seredo town,
Go to Seredo town in the false Rendersia and deliver
Lucoria's letter to Lieselotte. She knows that she is thought to be dead.
She seems to be wondering. She will return to Lucoria with her report.

At the request of Lucoria at the mayor's house in Seredo town,\nI went to Seredo town in the false Rendersia and delivered\nLucoria's letter to my sister Lieselotte. She found out that Lieselotte's diary, kept by her sister Lucoria, continued even after Lieselotte's death.
It seems that Mayor Burat in the town of Seredo is asking for\nhelp.

At the request of Mayor Burat in Seredot Town, I delivered the high-quality wool dropped by\n<%sEV_QUE_NAME0> on the Seredot Mountain Path to the tool shop Sherata.\nLet's deliver her beautiful package given to her by Sherata to her mayor, Burat.

At the request of Mayor Burat in the town of Seredo,
I delivered some high-quality wool to the tool shop Sherata.
Let's deliver her beautiful package given to her by Sherata to her mayor, Burat.
Looks like the mayor is in church now.

At the request of Mayor Burat in the town of Seredo, I delivered some high-quality wool to the
tool shop Sherata. As he delivered
a beautiful package given to him by Sherata to Mayor Bulat, he witnessed the church collapse
